entry.title: Bakhmut Is Largely Under Russian Control, Says Ukrainian General
entry.content: The capture of the city would mark the only significant success of a monthslong Russian offensive that has severely depleted its military.

entry.title: Brutal Battle for Bakhmut Leaves Russia With an Uncertain Victory
entry.content: Ukraine sought to deplete the Russians—and prepare for a new offensive—by continuing to fight for the small city. But nine months of attrition warfare cost both sides dearly.
